thread.title: Paul Ryan headed toward House speakership, Pelosi says
thread.title_full: Paul Ryan headed toward House speakership, Pelosi says | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Paul Ryan headed toward House speakership, Pelosi says
text:
WASHINGTON U.S. House of Representatives Democratic Leader Nancy Pelosi on Thursday said Republican Paul Ryan appears to be on a path toward becoming the next speaker of the bitterly divided chamber.
"We'll look forward to welcoming him (Ryan) if that all works out in the next few days. It looks like it will," Pelosi told reporters at her weekly press conference.
(Reporting by Richard Cowan ; Editing by Will Dunham )
